name: Dowell
description:
Dowell - is a fast growing company that has experience in the IT-industry for more than 4 years as a company, and experience some of the staff reaches more than 18 years in the development in general. We are interested in exciting and large-scale projects. We can proudly say that we have developed such large projects as the Yeed, Brandradionetworks.com and heandshetoday.com.
But this is just a part of our portfolio, we do not only developing services, but also creating graphics for gaming, generating ideas for it. We can develop presentations, interactive training courses, promo video. In our team we have experts on a motion design and development of games for mobile platforms. Everything we do - we do well, and if we do not do it well, we do it great! Techs as an art...
